system.sustained:
Psyker makes Opposed -10 Willpower vs Target Individual's Toughness. If target fails they suffer Psy Rating Energy Damage, +1 per Degree of Failiure on Toughness Test. This damage ignores Toughness Bonus and Armour.
If this damage kills the target, the psyker can immediately recast the psychic power as a Free Action on any legal target within 5 metres of the original target.
